Class Pair<L,R>

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair<L,R>
Type Parameters:
L - the type of the left object
R - the type of the right object
@Composition public class Pair<L,R> extends Object
This class is a composition of 2 objects, named left and right.
